text_block_list.text:
Our training for the 
Spring Tennō Shō has begun in earnest.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Controlling my breathing 
has gotten much easier.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Now that we've finished today's regimen, 
what do we do now?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
If it's okay with you, 
I'd like to continue running.

Hmm, there doesn't seem to be any harm in it, 
and she looks like she really wants to…

Hmm, there doesn't seem to be any harm in it, 
and she looks like she really wants to…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, thank you. 
I could never be satisfied with that amount of training.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Here I go!

It feels as though this is the first time I've truly trained with 
Mejiro McQueen since inheriting this team.

I guess this is because we finally have a 
goal we're striving towards, together.

I guess this is because we finally have a 
goal we're striving towards, together.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, hello! 
McQueen is looking great!
Oh, hey Ryan.
Oh, hey Ryan.
Mejiro Ryan looked so happy for her.

The only reason that Mejiro McQueen was able to recover was 
because of the advice you gave me, Mejiro Ryan.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Now that my rival is back in form, I have to do my best to try 
and win the Spring Tennō Shō as well!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, thank you too. 
I'm so glad I talked you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
This race is getting exciting, huh? 
Even though I'll be the one winning it!

In order to win the Spring Tennō Shō, we need to make sure that 
Mejiro McQueen is in top condition.

In order to win the Spring Tennō Shō, we need to make sure that 
Mejiro McQueen is in top condition.

A few days later… the day that Mejiro McQueen had been longing 
for finally arrived, the Spring Tennō Shō.
So what do you want to eat after the race?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Eh…? Err, well… We are in Kyoto, 
so how about some local cuisine?
Okay…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Um… that was an awful 
attempt at relieving the tension.
Seems so…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Jeez, get it together. Keeping calm is an 
important skill for trainers you know.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I'm worried that you've already 
lost all of your motivation.

It's times like this that make 
me envy Sensei's sociable nature.

Unlike Sensei, I'm unable to put on a 
cheerful facade to help her relax. But…
choice_data_list: I'll be cheering you on instead!

text_block_list.text:
Unlike Sensei, I'm unable to put on a 
cheerful facade to help her relax. But…
choice_data_list: I'll be cheering you on instead!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …Hehe. Please do.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
My dream is finally within my grasp. 
Now I just need to reach out and grab it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'll definitely win, just you wait!
